scripts.buildSequelize: npx tsc --project tsconfig.sequelize.json && npx tsc --project tsconfig.sequelize-config.json && echo {"type":"commonjs"} > ./sequelize/package.json
scripts.migrations: npm run buildSequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate
scripts.migrationsUndoAll: npm run buildSequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all
scripts.seeders: npm run buildSequelize && npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all
